trans-unit.source: Left without their leader Raksha, the leonin split into two prides: one side supported the regent kha, while the other rebelled in fury.
trans-unit.target: 失去领导者洛夏的狮族已分裂成两群：一群尊奉摄政狮王，另一群则含怒叛离。

trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以支付{X}。若你如此作，从你的牌库中搜寻一张总法术费用等于或小于X的武具牌，并将之放进战场。然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: "The jeweler, the potter, the smith . . . They all imbue a bit of their souls into their creations. The kami destroy that crafted mortal shell and absorb the soul within."\n—Noboru, master kitemaker

trans-unit.source: In Lorwyn's brief evenings, the sun pauses at the horizon long enough for a certain species of violet to bloom with the fragrance of mischief.
trans-unit.target: 在洛温的短暂午后时光，太阳会在地平线停留一会，刚好足以让某些种类的紫罗兰开花，散出作弄的香味。

trans-unit.source: Bloodthrone Vampire
trans-unit.target: 血座吸血鬼

trans-unit.resname: MM2·72 | Bloodthrone Vampire | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Sacrifice a creature: CARDNAME gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲一个生物：CARDNAME得+2/+2直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Some humans willingly offered up their blood, hoping it would grant the vampire families the strength to stave off the Eldrazi.
trans-unit.target: 有些人类自愿献上鲜血，希望这能增强吸血鬼家族的力量，好将奥札奇击退。

trans-unit.source: Bone Splinters
trans-unit.target: 碎骨贯身

trans-unit.resname: MM2·73 | Bone Splinters | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast CARDNAME, sacrifice a creature.\nDestroy target creature.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲一个生物，以作为施放CARDNAME的额外费用。 消灭目标生物。

trans-unit.source: Witches of the Split-Eye Coven speak of a future when Grixis will overflow with life energy. For now, they must harvest vis from the living to fuel their dark magics.
trans-unit.target: 在共眼集巫师谈述的未来中，格利极将会充满生命能量。而目前来说，他们得从活物采收生命来当作黑暗法术的能量。

trans-unit.source: Daggerclaw Imp
trans-unit.target: 刃爪小恶魔

trans-unit.resname: MM2·74 | Daggerclaw Imp | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nCARDNAME can't block.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 CARDNAME不能进行阻挡。

trans-unit.source: The Simic use the claws as scalpels, while the Rakdos use them for tattooing and torture. The Gruul use them to pick their teeth after lunching on the rest of the carcass.
trans-unit.target: 析米克用这爪子当解剖刀，拉铎司拿来纹身与拷问。古鲁则是把猎物吃干抹净后当成牙签。

trans-unit.source: Dark Confidant
trans-unit.target: 黑暗亲信

trans-unit.resname: MM2·75 | Dark Confidant | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. You lose life equal to its converted mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，展示你的牌库顶牌，并将该牌置于你手上。你失去等同于其总法术力费用的生命。

trans-unit.source: Greatness, at any cost.
trans-unit.target: 追求卓越，不计代价。

trans-unit.source: Death Denied
trans-unit.target: 入土难安

trans-unit.resname: MM2·76 | Death Denied | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Return X target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 将X张目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

trans-unit.source: Takenuma was filled with a chorus of moans, shrieks, and wails. Some came from the living, some from the dying, and some, most horribly, from the dead.
trans-unit.target: 回荡竹沼间的合唱曲包括了各种呻吟、尖鸣与哀嚎。有些来自生者，有些来自濒死者，而最恐怖的则来自死者。

trans-unit.source: Deathmark
trans-unit.target: 死印

trans-unit.source: Destroy target green or white creature.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标绿色或白色生物。

trans-unit.source: There are few ways to escape the deathmark: bargaining with a demon, washing in the fabled waters of youth, and of course, death.
trans-unit.target: 躲过死印的方法不多：与恶魔谈条件，浸浴在传说中的青春泉水，以及最理所当然的，先去寻死。

trans-unit.source: Devouring Greed
trans-unit.target: 贪欲吞噬

trans-unit.resname: MM2·78 | Devouring Greed | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast CARDNAME, you may sacrifice any number of Spirits.\nTarget player loses 2 life plus 2 life for each Spirit sacrificed this way. You gain that much life.
trans-unit.target: 你可以牺牲任意数量的精怪，以作为施放CARDNAME的额外费用。 目标牌手失去2点生命，且每以此法牺牲一个精怪，便再失去2点生命。你获得等量的生命。

trans-unit.source: Dismember
trans-unit.target: 肢解

trans-unit.source: ({PB} can be paid with either {B} or 2 life.)\nTarget creature gets -5/-5 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: （{B/P}可用{B}或2点生命来支付。） 目标生物得-5/-5直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "You serve Phyrexia. Your pieces would better serve Phyrexia elsewhere."\n—Azax-Azog, the Demon Thane
trans-unit.target: 「你会服侍非瑞克西亚。你的碎块会在他处将非瑞克西亚服侍得更好。」 ～恶魔伯爵亚札佐

trans-unit.source: Dread Drone
trans-unit.target: 可怖奴兽

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, put two 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature tokens onto the battlefield. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {1} to your mana pool."
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，将两个0/1无色奥札奇／后裔衍生生物放进战场。它们具有「牺牲此生物：加{1}到你的法术力池中。」

trans-unit.source: Each Eldrazi ancient spawned a lineage of horrors in unfathomable shapes.
trans-unit.target: 每个奥札奇先祖所繁衍的惊惧兽，都各有难以想像的外貌。

trans-unit.target: 暮猎蝙蝠

trans-unit.target: 嗜血1（如果对手本回合曾受过伤害，此生物进战场时上面有一个+1/+1指示物。） 飞行

trans-unit.source: The swamps go silent at its approach, but it still hears the heartbeat of the prey within.
trans-unit.target: 沼泽因其现身而陷入寂静，但它依旧能听到猎物的心跳声。

trans-unit.resname: MM2·82 | Endrek Sahr, Master Breeder | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Endrek Sahr, Master Breeder
trans-unit.target: 培育师恩德瑞克萨尔

trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a creature spell, put X 1/1 black Thrull creature tokens onto the battlefield, where X is that spell's converted mana cost.\nWhen you control seven or more Thrulls, sacrifice CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放生物咒语时，将X个1/1黑色索尔兽衍生生物放进战场，X为该咒语的总法术力费用。 当你操控七个或更多索尔兽时，牺牲CARDNAME。

trans-unit.target: 魂魅化形

trans-unit.source: Changeling (This card is every creature type at all times.)\n{1}{B}: CARDNAME gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 化形（此牌随时都是所有生物类别。） {1}{B}：CARDNAME得+1/+1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: In desolate places, changelings may take the shape of fancies, or memories, or fears.
trans-unit.target: 在最艰困的环境下，化形可能将外观变化为奇想、回忆，或是恐惧。

trans-unit.source: Grim Affliction
trans-unit.target: 残酷折磨

trans-unit.source: Even the small wounds let hope bleed out.
trans-unit.target: 就连小伤口也会让希望流干。

trans-unit.target: 灌输侵染

trans-unit.source: "The results of our ninth inoculation were the same. The specimen was, of course, euthanized before the contagion could spread."\n—Vedalken research notes
trans-unit.target: 「第九次的预防接种结果相同。当然，在实验样本能够扩散传染之前便已将其安乐死。」 ～维多肯研究纪录

trans-unit.source: Many have heard the beginning of its low, sustained shriek but few the end.
trans-unit.target: 许多人听过它低沉、绵长尖叫的开头，但很少有人听到结尾。

trans-unit.source: Just as a changeling's influence can have dramatic effects, so too can its sudden withdrawal.
trans-unit.target: 化形的影响可能造成戏剧性效果，其突然退却也是一样。

trans-unit.target: {B}，牺牲一个生物：目标生物得-1/-1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "Look at her, once filled with innocence. Death has a way of wringing away such . . . deficiencies."\n—Savra
trans-unit.target: 「瞧瞧她，曾是如此无邪。死亡最在行的，就是挤干这种...缺陷。」 ～撒芙儿

trans-unit.target: 渎神指命

trans-unit.source:
Choose two —
• Target player loses X life.
• Return target creature card with converted mana cost X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
• Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn.
• Up to X target creatures gain fear until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 选择两项～ • 目标牌手失去X点生命。 • 将目标总法术力费用等于或小于X的生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。 • 目标生物得-X/-X直到回合结束。 • 至多X个目标生物获得恐惧异能直到回合结束。

At the beginning of your next end step, exile it.\nPersist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME进战场时，将目标生物牌在你的操控下从对手的坟墓场放进战场。它获得敏捷异能。在你的下一个结束步骤开始时，将它放逐。 留存（当此生物死去时，若其上没有-1/-1指示物，则将它在其拥有者的操控下移回战场，且其上有一个-1/-1指示物。）

trans-unit.target: {1}{B}：将CARDNAME从你的坟墓场横置移回战场。

trans-unit.source: Though you may see the same bones, you'll never see the same skeleton twice.
trans-unit.target: 虽然都是同样的一组骨头，但你眼前不会出现两个同样的骷髅妖。

trans-unit.target: 腐食龙兽

trans-unit.source: Dragons consider drakes to be mockeries of their perfection, destroying them on sight.
trans-unit.target: 巨龙见到龙兽就杀，觉得这是对完美自身的拙劣模仿。

trans-unit.target: 「你杀过在你作物上乱爬的昆虫吗？我想奥札奇就是这样子来对付我们的。」 ～昂度猎场看守人席妲

trans-unit.source: Life is ephemeral. Phyrexia is eternal.

trans-unit.target: 他们会在每次出猎前划伤身体。如此就必须在日出之前进食，否则将失血而亡。

trans-unit.target: 受逐吸血鬼

trans-unit.target: 一些吸血鬼很排斥同族那样颓废的外貌。一旦他们狂性大发，再多的鲜血都无法满足饥渴。

trans-unit.target: 「邪鬼与其他恶灵每年都会在各村落间游行一遍，四处扰人安眠。战争开始之后，这队伍变成每晚出现。」 ～《逆神之战侧记》

trans-unit.source: Banefire
trans-unit.target: 禁咒焰

trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对目标生物或牌手造成X点伤害。 如果X等于或大于5，则CARDNAME不能被咒语或异能反击，且其伤害不能被防止。

trans-unit.source: For Sarkhan Vol, the dragon is the purest expression of life's savage splendor.
trans-unit.target: 对萨坎沃来说，巨龙是蛮勇生命的极致具现。

trans-unit.resname: MM2·105 | Blades of Velis Vel | Card Name

trans-unit.source: "The changing kind suffers as we do. We must join as one to quench our tyrants!"

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand.\n{T}: Add {G}{U} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 当CARDNAME进战场时，将一个由你操控的地移回其拥有者手上。 {T}：加{G}{U}到你的法术力池中。
